SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT `ID` AS id,`DDParentID` AS parentId,`DDCode` AS `code`,`DDName` AS `name`,`DDDesc` AS `desc`,`DDStatus` AS `status`,`DDSort` AS sort,`CreateTime` AS createTime,`CreateUser` AS createUser,`UpdateTime` AS updateTime,`UpdateUser` AS updateUser FROM `P_DataDic` WHERE DDStatus = 1 <%= AND `DDCode` = @@Code@@%> <%= AND `DDName` = @@Name@@%> ORDER BY DDParentID,DDSort,ID
